alert.note: Alert for Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 01 at 10:36AM EDT until further notice by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Sanford affecting Seminole County. .The Saint Johns River at Sanford is forecast to continue a slow decline and fall out of moderate flood and into minor flood stage late Wednesday. Interests along the river will continue to see moderate to minor flood impacts through mid week. For the St. Johns River...including Sanford...Moderate flooding is forecast into Wednesday. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM EDT. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate to minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St Johns River Near Sanford. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Water begins to move over sea wall around Lake Monroe and rises into grassy areas around the sea wall. Water begins to encroach on Seminole Boulevard. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 7.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM EDT Tuesday was 7.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.1 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun St Johns River Sanford 5.5 7.1 Tue 9 am 7.0 6.9 6.8 6.7 6.6 &&
